Projects - This Website

This website was created to familiarize myself with front-end development and as a portfolio. All code was written from scratch apart from the following:

  • OverlayScrollbars for the custom scroll bars
  • loading symbols for the symbol that displays as pages load

This site was written in Type Script and SCSS and uses Webpack to build. It's a single page site with a tree like structure where child pages are dynamically loaded when navigated to. Switching which child page displays is done through an animations chosen depending the parent node's level.

A top level page swapping using a rotating animation.

A child page swapping using a slide animation.

Carousels are used to navigate between child pages. They can be images or text and can be clicked or dragged. When an item is selected, it's corresponding page would be loaded (though these don't have any pages associated with them).
